product_description: Palettone PUR is for use throughout commercial, retail, healthcare and education facilities.
recyclable_percentage_description: Product is 100% recyclable through ResiLoop program
compostable_conditions: Paper packaging for recycling or compost.
end_of_life_program_description: Recofloor recycling in UK and Polyflor is also a founding member of the ResiLoop Program based in Australia
water_reduction_techniques: 95% non potable water supply from natural (rainwater collection and spring) and recycled sources.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Backloading and 85% total capacity to minimise loads
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is non directional with no pattern repeat so material can be rotated and installed to minimize wastage.
factory_finished_description: Factory applied reinforced Polyurethane coating. Rolls cut to size during installation
other_comments: Polyflor safety flooring guarantees the slip rating will remain over the warranty period of the product. A P3 will be a P3 10 years later. Specifiers can rest assured the product will perform as designed.
type_of_packaging: Paper packaging and reusable pallets for distribution

product_description: Sports 67 is designed for indoor sports courts and sports gymnasiums

transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Backloading and 85% total capacity to minimise loads

other_comments: Sports 67 is not designed for use with free weights. It is designed for rebound ball and racquet sports, gymnasiums etc

product_description: Palettone SD where static control is required for the protection of electrical assets.
recyclable_percentage_description: Product is 100% recyclable through ResiLoop program
compostable_conditions: Paper packaging for recycling or compost.
end_of_life_program_description: Recofloor recycling in UK and Polyflor is also a founding member of the ResiLoop Program based in Australia
water_reduction_techniques: 95% non potable water supply from natural (rainwater collection and spring) and recycled sources.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Backloading and 85% total capacity to minimise loads
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is non directional with no pattern repeat so material can be rotated and installed to minimize wastage.
factory_finished_description: Product is ready to use once installed. There is no coating as this interferes with the static control performance of the product
other_comments: Palettone SD provides static control protection of assets by earthing users through the floor. It is suitable where Static Dissipative installations are needed. Earthing metal tape and conductive adhesive is also required to achieve electrical properties. Contact Polyflor for further assistance.
type_of_packaging: Paper packaging and reusable pallets for distribution

other_comments: OHMega EC provides static control protection of assets by earthing users through the floor. It is suitable where Electrically Conductive installations are needed. Earthing metal tape and conductive adhesive is also required to achieve electrical properties. Contact Polyflor for further assistance.

water_reduction_techniques: 95% non potable water supply from natural (rainwater collection and spring) and recycled sources.
transport_emissions_minimisation_techniq: Backloading and 85% total capacity to minimise loads
minimisation_design_strategy: Product is non directional with no pattern repeat so material can be rotated and installed to minimize wastage.
factory_finished_description: Factory applied reinforced Polyurethane coating. Product is cut to size during installation.
other_comments: Polyflor safety flooring guarantees the slip rating will remain over the warranty period of the product. A P3 will be a P3 10 years later. Specifiers can rest assured the product will perform as designed.
type_of_packaging: Paper packaging and reusable pallets for distribution
